name: PortalWay(v1.1) NotFinished
description:
This is part 2 of portal way

v1.1

THIS IS NOT FINISHED but I will tell the rough draft story its

in a world where people live on floating islands they use portals for transportation

there was a war between the three biggest islands, Ralks , Dalinila and Nouyna

Ralks is losing horribly its so bad that the island has started to fall and people have

been evacuated and transported to other floating islands such as (Nalion and Maoi) 

and you play as a child from Ralks trying to destroy the other two nations

also your name is jamie

The art will change and I will finish it probably in a couple weeks 3-5

more with arrow keys,  interact with space bar also tell me stuff i should add
